The five albums with the original formation of Baccara, Mayte Mateos and Maria Mendiola, recorded between the years 1977 and 1981. Cult classics like "Yes Sir I Can Boogie", "Sorry I'm A Lady", "Darling" and "Parlez-Vous FranÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â§ais?", plus 12 inch mixes, non-album tracks and alternate, French, German and Spanish language versions - but all originals released on RCA in the 70's and 80's, no re-recordings.
